text: (Indyarya) zizabahamagara (abemeramana) zibabwira ziti “Ese ntitwari kumwe namwe (ku isi)?” Bazisubize bati “Yego! Ariko mwishyize mu bigeragezo, mutega iminsi (Intumwa n’abemeramana), munishyira mu gushidikanya kandi munashukwa n’irari ryanyu kugeza ubwo itegeko rya Allah (urupfu) risohoye. Nuko umushukanyi (Shitani) abatesha umurongo wa Allah.”
